home.hero_description: Discover our latest arrivals featuring premium quality bags and accessories
home.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter and receive exclusive offers and updates on new arrivals
home.privacy_consent: By subscribing, you agree to our Privacy Policy and consent to receive updates
home.story_desc_1: Since our founding, we've been dedicated to creating premium accessories that combine timeless elegance with modern functionality. Each piece is carefully crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and design.
home.story_desc_2: Our commitment to sustainability and ethical production ensures that every product not only looks beautiful but also contributes to a better future.

product.related_products_description: You might also want to check out these products.
product.fast_delivery_desc: Your package will arrive in 3-5 business days at your pick up location or in the comfort of your home.
product.simple_exchanges_desc: Is the fit not quite right? No worries - we'll exchange your product for a new one.
product.easy_returns_desc: Just return your product and we'll refund your money. No questions asked – we'll do our best to make sure your return is hassle-free.

chat.title: Customer Support
chat.welcome: Hi! Welcome to Medusa Store. How can I help you today?
chat.agent_response: Thank you for your message. An agent will respond shortly.

footer.newsletter_text: Subscribe to receive the latest offers and new product information

size_guide.title: Size Guide
size_guide.chest_description: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape horizontal.
size_guide.chest_instruction: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape horizontal.
size_guide.waist_description: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape comfortably loose.
size_guide.waist_instruction: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape comfortably loose.
size_guide.hips_description: Measure around the fullest part of your hips, about 8 inches below your waist.
size_guide.hips_instruction: Measure around the fullest part of your hips, about 8 inches below your waist.
size_guide.length_description: Measure from the highest point of your shoulder down to your desired length.
size_guide.length_instruction: Measure from the highest point of your shoulder down to your desired length.
size_guide.fit_tip_1: If you're between sizes, we recommend sizing up for a more comfortable fit.
size_guide.fit_tip_2: Our garments are designed for a regular fit. Check product details for specific fit notes.
size_guide.fit_tip_3: Still unsure? Contact our customer service team for personalized sizing advice.

cart.empty_cart_message: You don't have anything in your cart. Let's change that, use the link below to start browsing our products.
cart.sign_in_better_experience: Sign in for a better experience.

checkout.billing_same_as_shipping: Billing address same as shipping address
checkout.review_terms_text: By clicking the Place Order button, you confirm that you have read, understand and accept our Terms of Use, Terms of Sale and Returns Policy and acknowledge that you have read Medusa Store's Privacy Policy.
checkout.saved_address_greeting: Hi {name}, do you want to use one of your saved addresses?

account.sign_in_description: Sign in to access an enhanced shopping experience.
account.register_description: Create your Medusa Store Member profile, and get access to an enhanced shopping experience.
account.register_terms_text: By creating an account, you agree to Medusa Store's
account.got_questions_description: You can find frequently asked questions and answers on our customer service page.
